job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: The things that you will tackle:Ability to understand the business context and identify use-cases where data science and technology can drive the business solutionDesign, create, test and implement complex models and algorithms that drive analytical solutions throughout the organizationConduct advanced statistical and other analyses to provide actionable insights, identify trends, and measure performance.Collaborate with the Product, Engineer, and Business teams and understands business problems to implement scalable and sustainable solutionsCoordinate with MIS, Digital Specialists, and Data Engineers to deliver holistic analytical solutionsSupport translators in communicating the design, functioning, and output of the analytical models/solutions developedEnsure timely analysis and testing for regular maintenance of solutions over timeWhat you will need to be successful:Advanced Degree in Computer Science, Computer Applications, Statistics, Mathematics or other relevant field is strongly preferredStrong experience in a statistical and/or data science/business intelligence rolePrior experience in machine learning, statistics, optimization, or related fields; deeper experience in working with large data sets, simulation/ optimization, or distributed computing tools is a plusLeverage solid principles and a clear framework when approaching data science and data engineer tasks; demonstrates second-order thinkingDeep understanding of data science techniques and their mathematical underpinningsExperience with programming is required; specific experience in R or Python is a plusExperience of working with large data sets, simulation/ optimization, and distributed computing tools (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, etc.) is a plusPrevious experience with healthcare or social network use cases are a plusUser research and user testing. Experience with quantitative methods and analytics is a plus.
